descriptionHTML:
Pattern Digital watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. Pattern Digital Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

Pattern Digital Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ 24-hour time format
✔ Battery level
✔ Ambient mode
✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month

How to use Pattern Digital Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the Pattern Digital watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Pattern Digital Watch Face for Android Wear!

Follow us:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:
FWF Market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bb.fwf.market
comments: Watch Face is OK but Watch Face is OK but won't show the date in the correct way shows (06/00),I have emailed the maker but no response
recentChanges: - Watches battery usage reduced in 5 times
If no changes applied, follow next steps: Settings -> Apps -> Your watchface -> Force stop -> Reboot. Or just reinstall app.
